name: Comet Lisp IDE
short_description:
This project is under planning phase..

Comet Lisp IDE is an Visual Rad IDE for the Comet Lisp language for users who will built dotJET applications for Windows and Linux and later also MacOSX, IOS on IPhone, Android and Windows Mobile as well. Users can build and run different types of applications by using the visual gui designer inside Comet Lisp IDE for drawing and placing widgets and components on forms and then write code in the Comet Lisp Language. Comet Lisp is going to be built for the new .Jet Framework which is still under construction and planning phase.

more info coming soon..
summary: An Visual IDE for developing in Comet Lisp
